description.lang: 2-Button Z-Wave Remote ControlDesigned to be used with a range of Z-Wave compliant devices such as dimmers, drape controllers and motorised screens. The product is simple yet supports a range of Z-Wave network functionality. A Configuration Switch changes between Operation Mode and Configuration Mode. In Configuration Mode the product can Include, Exclude and create / remove Assigned Associations, as well as replicate the Routing Table to and from other Z-Wave devices. This makes it ideal as a small, inexpensive and simple to use Portable Controller for installing and configuring Z-Wave networks.
